body:
> Here is a proposed release schedule for 0.20.0, the next major release of Bitcoin Core. Like for previous major releases I've aimed for a release 6 months after the last (#15940).
> 
> ## 2020-03-01 
> * Open Transifex translations for 0.20
> * Soft translation string freeze (no large or unnecessary string changes until release)
> * Finalize and close translations for 0.18
> 
> ## 2020-03-15 
> * Feature freeze (bug fixes only until release)
> * Translation string freeze (no more source language changes until release)
> 
> ## 2020-04-01 
> * Split off `0.20` branch from `master`
> * Start RC cycle, tag and release `0.20.0rc1`
> * Start merging for 0.21 on master branch
> 
> ## 2020-05-03 
> * Release 0.20.0 final (aim)
> 
> If any specific dates or timeframes are a problem for you, let me know.
https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/issues/17432#
